thread.title: British expat helps tackle refugee crisis in Greece
thread.title_full: British expat helps tackle refugee crisis in Greece [Video]

author: Press Association video
title: British expat helps tackle refugee crisis in Greece
text:
British expat helps tackle refugee crisis in Greece Press Association video â€¢ 6 February 2017 Eric Kempson and his family are helping to tackle the humanitarian issue on the doorstep of their home in Eftalou, on the island of Lesbos.
The 61-year-old, who is originally from Hampshire, said the boats are still coming, with refugees often wearing fake life jackets and during winter are at risk of hypothermia and frostbite.
While stood in front of a mountain of used life jackets, Mr Kempson said there are at least 150,000 currently in the pile - but that this figure is only half of the original.
